thread.title: HC gives major relief to Babul Supriyo, stays Mahua Moitra’s ‘outraging modesty’ case
thread.title_full: HC gives major relief to Babul Supriyo, stays Mahua Moitra’s ‘outraging modesty’ case

author: FE Online
title: HC gives major relief to Babul Supriyo, stays Mahua Moitra’s ‘outraging modesty’ case
text:
HC gives major relief to Babul Supriyo, stays Mahua Moitra’s ‘outraging modesty’ case HC gives major relief to Babul Supriyo, stays Mahua Moitra’s ‘outraging modesty’ case Moitra, in her complaint filed on January 4, alleged that Supriyo made jokes at her expense, making fun of her initial name "Mahua" by linking it to a local drink of same-name By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: March 20, 2017 5:56 PM Moitra filed a case with Kolkata Police against Supriyo on March 10. 
Union Minister Babul Supriyo on Monday received a major relief in a case filed by Trinamool Congress MLA Mahua Moitra alleging former of outraging her modesty. Moitra had alleged Supriyo of “outraging her modesty” during a televised debate with words and gestures. Moitra filed a case with Kolkata Police against Supriyo on January 4. Moitra, in her complaint, alleged that Supriyo made jokes at her expense, making fun of her initial name “Mahua” by linking it to a local drink of same-name. Supriyo, however, had downplayed the development. “Chargesheet filed against me for asking Mohua Mitra, ‘Mohua are you on Mohua?’ while she was spewing venom against me and NaMo,” the singer had said on Twitter. Singer’s message was followed by a laughing emoji. The charge sheet was submitted at the Alipore Court, along with footage of the TV show in question. Supriyo had ignored three summons issued to him, a senior police officer said. 
Watch else is making news | How Vodafone-Idea Merger Will Affect Your Monthly Mobile Bill 
The state police also submited the footage of the programme in which the alleged remarks were made. The TMC MLA had registered her complaint at the Alipore police station. Mahua Moitra, who is a young face of Mamata Banerjee -led Trinamool Congress is an Ex-investment banker turned Politician. The leader is a member of the West Bengal Legislative Assembly and represents the Karimpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency). Moitra was vice-president of JP Morgan before active entering in politics.
